articles.title: Rashid Khan's post with Rohit Sharma confirms India-Afghanistan joint force to knock Australia out of T20 World Cup - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rashid Khan shared a special post after Afghanistan and India outclassed Australia to enter the T20 World Cup semi-finals. | Crickit
articles.content: Proving legendary West Indies cricketer Brian Lara right, Rashid Khan guided Afghanistan to a historic semi-final of the T20 World Cup 2024 with a thrilling win over Bangladesh on Tuesday. Giant-kill… [+2067 chars]
